item.title: 彭博新经济》在圣保罗的最新报道
item.description: 2013 年 8 月 23 日星期五，巴西圣保罗市中心景观，背景为保利斯塔大道。(照片：Paulo Fridman/Corbis via Getty Images）【原文：a view of downtown Sao Paulo, Brazil, with Paulista 's Avenue in the background on Friday August 23rd, 2013. (Photo by Paulo Fridman/Corbis via Getty Images)】

item.title: 波音首席执行官称飞机制造商的问题需要时间解决
item.description: 波音公司（Boeing Co.波音公司首席执行官凯利-奥特伯格（Kelly Ortberg）直言不讳地指出，波音公司正处于十字路口，面临着从巨额债务到严重业绩失误等各种挑战，需要时间来弥补，然后才能考虑开发新型飞机。【原文：Boeing Co. Chief Executive Officer Kelly Ortberg provided an unvarnished view of his company at a crossroads, absorbed by challenges ranging from huge debt to serious performance lapses that will need time to fix before it can consider developing a new aircraft.】

item.title: 人工智能模型名称是怎么回事？
item.description: 最近，我一直在思考科技公司给他们的人工智能生成模型起的名字，以及为什么这么多模型都会提到希腊神话和动物。但首先...【原文：I’ve been thinking a lot lately about the names tech companies give their generative artificial intelligence models, and why so many of them reference Greek mythology and animals. But first…】

item.title: 资金短缺的大学正在出售其珍贵的艺术品和豪宅
item.description: 凯里厅是康沃尔艺术学院皇冠上的明珠。【原文：Kerry Hall is the crown jewel of the Cornish College of the Arts.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款活动指数降至 8 月以来最低水平
item.description: 受近期抵押贷款利率飙升的影响，上周美国购房和再融资抵押贷款申请量均降至 8 月份以来的最低水平。【原文：US mortgage applications for both home purchases and refinancing dropped last week to the lowest levels since August, hobbled by a recent surge in mortgage rates.】

item.title: 台积电发现芯片被转给华为后切断客户关系
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. discovered this month that chips it made for a specific customer ended up with Huawei Technologies Co., a potential violation of US sanctions intended to sever the flow of technology to a Chinese national champion.】

item.title: 中东风险令石油交易商空前青睐期权
item.description: 石油交易商持有的期权合约数量创下历史新高，因为他们试图防范中东潜在供应中断导致的价格飙升风险。【原文：Oil traders are holding a record number of options contracts as they seek to protect against the risk of a price spike driven by potential supply disruptions in the Middle East.】

item.title: AT&T公司收入低于预期，原因是设备收入减少
item.description: AT&T Inc.报告称，本季度销售额几乎持平，新增宽带用户也少于分析师预期。【原文：AT&T Inc. reported virtually flat sales and fewer new broadband customers than analysts expected in a quarter that was challenged by a worker strike.】

item.title: 巴克莱称特朗普贸易威胁已被计入欧洲股市
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays）策略师表示，唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选可能导致的贸易关税风险已被计入欧洲主要出口商的股票价格中。【原文：The risk of potential trade tariffs resulting from a Donald Trump US election win has already been priced into shares of major European exporters, according to Barclays strategists.】

item.title: 康明斯目标到 2030 年将非洲的电力需求收入翻一番
item.description: 康明斯公司（Cummins Inc. ）的目标是到本十年末，将其在非洲的收入翻一番，因为这家美国发动机和发电机制造商将充分利用非洲大陆 3 亿人的用电需求。【原文：Cummins Inc. aims to double its revenue from Africa by the end of the decade as the US engine and power generator maker capitalizes on demand to provide 300 million people on the continent with electricity.】

item.title: 尼日利亚法院释放被拘留数月的 Binance 高管
item.description: 尼日利亚政府撤销了对因涉嫌洗钱和操纵货币而受审的 Binance 控股有限公司高管的指控。【原文：The Nigerian government dropped charges against a Binance Holdings Ltd. executive standing trial on allegations of money laundering and currency manipulation, who had been detained in the country since February.】

item.title: 高盛的悲观观点引发了关于股票的争论
item.description: 预测市场很难，有些人甚至认为不可能。但这并不妨碍华尔街的精英们年复一年地投身其中。本周，高盛集团（Goldman Sachs）警告说，未来十年，美国 500 指数的年回报率可能会缩小到区区 3%，摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）则认为这一观点过于悲观。【原文：Forecasting the market is hard, some would say impossible. But that doesn’t keep Wall Street's best and brightest from diving in to the fray, year after year. Rarely have their predictive energies been on greater display than this week, when Goldman Sachs warned that annual S&P 500 returns may narrow to a paltry 3% over the next decade, only for JPMorgan Asset Management to say the view is too dour.】

item.title: 恒瑞医药被指考虑在香港二次上市
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司正在考虑最快于明年在香港第二次上市。【原文：Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that could happen as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: 据说 PE 公司在围攻德国维生素补充剂制造商 Orthomol
item.description: 知情人士透露，CVC Capital Partners 和 L Catterton 是竞购德国高端维生素补充剂制造商 Orthomol 的私募股权公司之一。【原文：CVC Capital Partners and L Catterton are among the private equity firms bidding for German premium vitamin supplement maker Orthomol, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 随着 Galp 钻机的抵达，纳米比亚将掀起下一波石油钻探热潮
item.description: 随着 Galp Energia SGPS SA 公司的钻井平台抵达现有发现附近，纳米比亚的下一波海上石油钻探即将开始。【原文：Namibia’s next wave of offshore oil drilling is set to begin with the arrival of a rig near an existing discovery made by Galp Energia SGPS SA.】

item.title: 先锋、高盛青睐欧洲债券而非美国国债
item.description: 先锋集团（Vanguard）和高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Vanguard and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. are among the firms betting that German government bonds faring better than US Treasury debt is a theme that has further to go.】

item.title: 斯洛文尼亚希望任命前总理为央行行长
item.description: 斯洛文尼亚领导人挑选了一位前总理来领导中央银行；这一举措将使现任行长博斯特扬-瓦斯莱（Bostjan Vasle）靠边站，因为他的候选资格缺乏政治支持。【原文：Slovenia’s leader picked a former prime minister to lead the central bank — a step that would push aside current Governor Bostjan Vasle, whose candidacy lacked political support.】

item.title: DSV 将提前启动债券销售，为 143 亿欧元交易融资
item.description: 丹麦运输公司 DSV A/S 最快将于今年开始大规模出售债券，以帮助支付其 143 亿欧元（约合 154 亿美元）收购德铁信可公司（DB Schenker）的费用，预计收购将于 2025 年完成。【原文：Danish transport company DSV A/S will start a large bond sale as soon as this year to help pay for its €14.3 billion takeover ($15.4 billion) of DB Schenker ahead of an expected completion in 2025.】

item.title: 美国大选临近，Lombard Odier 认为日本股市是 "双赢 "之选
item.description: Lombard Odier 看涨日本股票，认为无论美国大选结果如何，日本市场都是一个甜蜜点。【原文：Lombard Odier is turning bullish on Japanese equities, seeing the market as a sweet spot whatever the outcome of the US election.】

item.title: 对特朗普回归的押注助推乌克兰美元债券反弹
item.description: 基金经理们一直在购买乌克兰的美元债券，押注唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选，并采取措施加速结束与俄罗斯的战争。【原文：Fund managers have been buying Ukraine’s dollar bonds in a bet on Donald Trump winning the US election and taking steps that would accelerate an end to the war with Russia.】

item.title: 特斯拉财报显示电动汽车制造商进一步落后于大型科技公司
item.description: 随着股价下跌和利润缩水，特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc.投资者担心，季度业绩将使这家电动汽车制造商变得更加离群索居。【原文：With shares falling and profits shrinking, Tesla Inc. is increasingly looking like the odd one out among its mega-cap technology peers. Investors worry that quarterly results will make the electric-vehicle maker even more of an outlier.】

item.title: 印度批准普拉纳夫-乔达出任摩根大通银行部首席执行官
item.description: 印度中央银行批准任命 Pranav Chawda 为摩根大通银行（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：India’s central bank approved the appointment of Pranav Chawda as chief executive officer of JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s local banking unit for a period of three years.】

item.title: 交易员加码押注欧洲央行 12 月降息半点
item.description: 交易员们正在增加赌注，赌欧洲中央银行将在 12 月份降息半个百分点，以支撑该集团疲软的经济。【原文：Traders are adding to wagers that the European Central Bank will lower interest rates by half a percentage point in December to a bid to prop up the bloc’s flagging economy.】

item.title: 自印度央行 1 月打压以来，Paytm 股价收复失地
item.description: 自印度央行今年早些时候打击其支付业务以来，Paytm 的股价一直在走下坡路，此前该公司已获准吸收新用户。【原文：Paytm’s shares are on course to erase losses suffered since the Indian central bank’s crackdown on its payment business earlier this year, after the firm received an approval to onboard new users.】

item.title: 哈贝克提议给予 10%的投资奖励以刺激德国经济增长
item.description: 德国经济部旨在通过直接向企业提供 10%的资金来促进国内投资，这是德国经济部振兴经济增长的最新计划。【原文：The German economy ministry aims to bolster domestic investment by providing 10% of the funds directly to companies, in the latest plan to revive economic growth.】

item.title: 德国 SEFE 公司与康菲石油公司签署 10 年期天然气协议
item.description: 德国国有企业 SEFE 签署了一项向康菲石油公司购买天然气的协议，为期 10 年，这是该公司确保欧洲燃料供应的最新举措。【原文：Germany’s state-owned SEFE signed an agreement to purchase gas from ConocoPhillips for 10 years, the latest move by the company to secure fuel supplies for Europe.】

item.title: 香港豪宅在不良资产处置中以 2,100 万美元售出
item.description: 香港浅水湾的一栋豪宅以 1.6 亿港元（约合 2,100 万美元）的价格售出，为今年连续出售的不良资产再添一笔。【原文：A mansion in Hong Kong’s Repulse Bay was sold for HK$160 million ($21 million), adding to a streak of distressed property disposals this year.】

item.title: 汇丰银行警告将在改革中削减高级经理职位
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）警告称，随着该银行开始进行最大规模的重组之一，将有可能裁减高级经理职位。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc warned it will likely cut senior manager jobs as the lender embarks on one of its biggest restructuring.】

item.title: 东京证券交易所员工因涉嫌内幕交易被调查
item.description: 东京证券交易所的一名员工因涉嫌内幕交易正接受日本证券监察机构的调查，这让一直带头改善公司治理的东京证券交易所感到尴尬。【原文：An employee at the Tokyo Stock Exchange is being investigated by the Japanese securities watchdog on suspicion of insider trading, an embarrassment for the organization that’s been spearheading efforts to improve corporate governance.】

item.title: 摩根大通在戴蒙大奖后再次关注液化天然气实物交易
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.）在观望了十多年之后，正在商谈再次启动液化天然气实物交易，此举符合首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）关于增加国内生产和能源出口的呼吁。【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is in talks to start trading physical liquefied natural gas again after more than a decade on the sidelines, a move that lines up with Chief Executive Officer Jamie Dimon’s calls for an increase in domestic production and energy exports.】
